biotools.summary:
Cross-disorder integration and multiscale neural contextualization of multisite neuroimaging datasets.

The ENIGMA TOOLBOX is an open source repository for the sharing of neuroimaging and genetics data, analytical codes, and visualization tools that are 100% ENIGMA-friendly and -focused.


The ENIGMA Consortium brings together researchers in imaging genomics to understand brain structure, function, and disease, based on brain imaging and genetic data. We welcome brain researchers, imagers, geneticists, methods developers, and others interested in cracking the neuro-genetic code!.
